extension.description:
JD Flyout Tabs

You can use JD Flyout Tabs to display a series of tabbed images on the left or right hand side of your browser that will 'flyout' when you hover your mouse over them.

JD Flyout Tabs formerly known as Flyout Tabs from Graphicaholic is now moved to JoomDev along with other Extensions. Check out the Announcement here.

Support | Demo | More Details

field.name: screenPosition
field.label: Tabs position
field.option: Left side of screen with Dropshadow effect
Right side of screen with Dropshadow effect

field.name: tabColor
field.label: Inside Tab Color-Idel
field.description: Click to choose your custom JD Flyout Tabs color in idel state.

field.name: tabBorder
field.label: Border Tab Color-Idel
field.description: Click to choose your custom JD Flyout Tabs border color in idel state.

field.name: tabColorhover
field.label: Inside Tab Color-Hover
field.description: Click to choose your custom JD Flyout Tabs color on mouseover.

field.name: tabBorderhover
field.label: Border Tab Color-Hover
field.description: Click to choose your custom JD Flyout Tabs border color on mouseover.

field.name: tabPosition
field.label: JD Flyout Tabs Top Position
field.description: Adjust the JD Flyout Tabs position from top of page.

field.name: tabWidth
field.label: JD Flyout Tabs Width
field.description: Adjust the JD Flyout Tabs width.

field.name: tabHeight
field.label: JD Flyout Tabs Height
field.description: Adjust the JD Flyout Tabs height.

field.name: tabLeftSet
field.label: JD Flyout Tabs Left Offset
field.description: Adjust the JD Flyout Tabs left offset to show more or less of each tab. The higher the minus value, the less the entire tab will show on your screen.

field.name: tabRightSet
field.label: JD Flyout Tabs Right Offset
field.description: Adjust the JD Flyout Tabs right offset to show more or less of each tab. The higher the minus value, the more the entire tab will show on your screen. The higher the value without the minus symbol, the less the entire tab will show on your screen

field.name: imagePosition
field.label: Image Position
field.description: Adjust the 'left-right' image position within the tabs. (default=20px).

field.name: imageTopPosition
field.label: Top Image Position
field.description: Adjust the 'Top' image position within the tabs. (default=0px).

field.name: tabLeftMargin
field.label: Left margin on mouseover
field.description: Adjusts the left margin position on mouseover. Some professional templates require this setting to be adjusted as much as -20px.

field.name: tabRightMargin
field.label: Right margin on mouseover
field.description: Adjusts the right margin position on mouseover. Some professional templates require this setting to be adjusted as much as -80px.

field.name: tabSpacing
field.label: Spacing between tabs
field.description: Adjust for amount of spacing in-between tabs.

field.name: position
field.label: Tab Behavior
field.description: Choose the 'Scroll with template' option if the number of useable tabs extends below the bottom of your page.

field.name: info1
field.default: You may display up to 15 JD Flyout Tabs. Leave 'Image path' empty to exclude a specific Flyout Tab from showing.

field.name: title1aPosition
field.label: Top-Bottom title position
field.description: Slightly increase or decrease this minus pixel setting to position title text as needed.

field.name: title1Color
field.label: Title color
field.description: Adjust as needed.

field.name: image1url
field.label: Image path for Tab 1
field.description: Does not support images stored away from your Joomla installation.

field.name: image1link

field.description: Use either a relative or absolute hyperlink path for your JD Flyout Tabs.

field.label: Link Behaviour
field.description: Select how you want to open your link.

field.label: Width of URL

field.label: Height of URL
